appDesc.message: Automatically like YouTube videos from your favorite content creators.

appStoreDesc.message: Presses the like button whenever you watch a video from a subscribed channel! No effort required. No need to authenticate. If you've already disliked a video this extension won't override your choice. Additionally, you can: - Be more selective with your likes: Only like videos after you've watched for 2 minutes or 50% of the way through. - Automatically like every video
